general_info.summary: This text appears to be a sitemap or navigation structure for a university website, listing various sections such as careers, university authorities, committees, policies, schools, academic programs, training and placement information, and feedback mechanisms. It includes links to specific documents like annual reports, ordinances, and statutes, as well as details about different schools and departments within the university.

admission_requirements.summary: This document outlines various aspects of the admission and counseling process, including applying for CUET counselling, admission alerts, details for Ph.D. admissions, domestic brochures for Indian students, prospectuses, course and fee structures for 2025-26, scholarship and bank loan information, transport, and hostel facilities. It also repeatedly highlights the 'Admission and Outreach Team' and the option to 'Apply Now 2025'.

feedback.summary: This document lists various categories of feedback related to a university or educational institution, including feedback from students on the curriculum, teachers, and the university in general. It also includes feedback from teachers regarding the curriculum, as well as feedback from alumni, parents, employers, and through course exit surveys. The list is repeated multiple times, with some minor formatting variations.
